title: Mr.JamsPawnEmporium
author: Mr.JamsPawnEmporium
created_time: June 01, 2022, 03:34:45 AMLast edit: June 01, 2022, 01:19:50 PM by Mr.JamsPawnEmporium
content: What's up guys! I've got a 1st edition Bitcoin Magazine for sale. It's sealed and never been opened. Fantastic condition.https://imgur.com/a/fdIPeZXTaking $1,000 (BTC0.032) or best offer. Will ship worldwide. Please DM me if you have any questions!

comments.author: slimzak
comments.body: Don't they go for $800 - $900 on ebay?

comments.author: Mr.JamsPawnEmporium
comments.body: I've seen them priced all over the place. Looks like one for $1500 on ebay and another for $900.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Yeah Ive seen them for as high 10,000 on ebay. But bitcoin magazine has them for sale still for $1000. Everyone told me this last week when I was looking for one. Nice to have every Bitcoin collectable expert at your fingertips.

comments.author: Mr.JamsPawnEmporium
comments.created_time: June 01, 2022, 01:19:14 PMLast edit: June 01, 2022, 03:05:01 PM by Mr.JamsPawnEmporium
comments.body: Yikes! Sorry guys Im a moron and made this post late last night. Should be BTC 0.032. That comes out to $1,017 (at current prices), so that's the cost of BTC Magazine's offer + shipping.*EDIT: fixed the price in the OP

comments.author: Mr.JamsPawnEmporium
comments.body: bumpif people think it's overpriced, happy to take best offer or do an auction
